# Introduction

A C++ program is described by a set of files, and you use a C++ compiler to output the actual C++ program that is described by these files. This post introduces the components of a C++ program to a beginner in the C++ language.

First of all, lets list the components that will be described here:

- C++ compiler;
- C++ translation unit;
- C++ header;
- Include directories;
- External libraries;
